subject: RE: Metro site edits
preview: Hi Trudy, Just confirming that this has been made live on the new site, hopefully you can see it now.

full_threads.body:
Hi Trudy, 

Just confirming that this has been made live on the new site, hopefully you can see it now.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: Logged 4 hrs to Harvest

Hi Heath,

It isn't showing correctly for me, even in incognito browser but just go ahead please - I am sure it's great.

Cheers

TRUDY MCENEARNEY​

Hi Trudy, 

Yes sure, no problems, we only did that to show how multiple articles will be displayed. 

https://www.metrorehab.com.au/about-us/clientstories/

You can have another look now. Let me know if you would like us to make this live?
@jona 4hrs time task

@heath here is the final page for the stories. https://www.metrorehab.com.au/about-us/clientstories/

Also I removed the other temp story.

Manuel M

Hi Heath,

Great thanks. Only thing is that the first story isn't a client story, so if that could be put back please.

Thanks very much.

@Manuel you can login through managewp

Thanks,
Manuel M

Hi Heath,

Thanks so much for this quick change! Much appreciated 😊

We have new client stories on the go at the moment so if we could create sections in the client stories page that would be great. Something similar to the RR site would work.

Kind regards,

Trudy.

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Thursday, 6 August 2020 8:34 PM
To: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au <mailto:Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>>
Cc: Janina Hipolito <Janina.Hipolito@Royalrehab.com.au <mailto:Janina.Hipolito@Royalrehab.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Metro site edits

Hi Trudy,

I completely agree… it took me a while to find them just now when I was looking to access how hard they are to find.

We have added them to the main navigation, I think it’s a good spot.

Regarding the client stories, it looks like there is only one at the moment? If this is the case, I would suggest to leave it as is until we have more to list. This avoids the user having to click in to read more and there being an archive page with only one story… I hope that makes sense?

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://wpperk.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Signature&utm_campaign=WolfIQ>
<https://wolfiq.com.au/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Signature&utm_campaign=WolfIQ>


On 6 Aug 2020, at 8:58 am, Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au <mailto:Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

I had a meeting with Metro yesterday and they said they get quite a bit of feedback that the referral form is difficult to find on the website.

Would you recommend making a Refer a tab in the main menu? I am thinking it could go next to NDIS services.

Also with the client stories, could we make that like the Royal Rehab website with separate sections for the different stories?

Kind regards,

Trudy.
